title: Helsinki Day - Celebrate the Capital's Birthday!
description: Helsinki comes alive on its birthday! Expect street performances, live music, free museums, food stalls, and family-friendly activities across the city. Whether you're a first-time visitor or a local, the cheerful atmosphere is irresistible. Don't miss the open-air concerts at Senate Square!

title: Korso Midsummer Bonfires - A Magical Finnish Tradition
description: Step into a Finnish fairytale with dancing, traditional folk music, and the iconic midsummer bonfire lighting on a beautiful island. Watch couples in national dress perform old folk dances, and enjoy grilled treats under the midnight sun. An unforgettable way to experience Finnish culture.

title: World Village Festival
description: Music, activism, and food from all over the globe-free entry! Join thousands to explore cultures, listen to powerful talks, try global street food, and shop ethical brands.

title: Pori Jazz Festival
description: Legendary names in jazz, soul, and pop gather in the charming coastal town of Pori. Enjoy big-name acts in a laid-back outdoor setting, surrounded by cafes and the scent of summer air.

title: Flow Festival
description: Wake up early for a splash-literally! Each year, one "Sleepyhead" is tossed into the sea at 7 AM, kicking off a day of festivities, parades, and local markets. It's quirky, charming, and full of small-town joy. Ideal for families and lovers of offbeat traditions.

title: World Wife Carrying Championships
description: Witness (or join!) the world's most entertaining race: husbands sprinting with their wives on their backs through a muddy obstacle course. The prize? The wife's weight in beer! Fun, bizarre, and unforgettable. This is Finland's humor and heart on full display.

title: Slush - Where the Future Is Born
description: Tech lovers, entrepreneurs, and investors unite at Europe's coolest startup conference. With electrifying keynotes, next-gen innovations, and legendary networking parties, Slush is the ultimate launchpad for bold ideas.

title: Tampere Theatre Festival
description: As the oldest annual theatre festival in the Nordic countries, Tampere Theatre Festival showcases a diverse range of performances, including drama, dance, and street theatre. With hundreds of performances and events, it's a must-visit for theatre enthusiasts.

title: Ilosaarirock - Rocking the East
description: One of Finland's oldest rock festivals, Ilosaarirock features over 50 artists across multiple stages. From heavy metal to punk rock, the festival offers a diverse lineup in a vibrant setting.

title: Secto Automotive Rally Finland
description: Known as the Finnish Rally, this World Rally Championship event offers high-speed action and breathtaking landscapes. It's a must-attend for motorsport enthusiasts and adventure seekers.

title: Mänttä Art Festival
description: As Finland's largest summer exhibition of contemporary art, the Mänttä Art Festival features works from 25 artists or groups, set against the backdrop of a charming small town. It's a haven for art lovers seeking inspiration.
